project_descr: Contributing to the SELAJSI Programme this Project aims to strengthen coordination between justice sector actors,systematized legal aid service provision & dispute resolution mechanisms & strengthen justice sect. institutional capacities.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthen coordination between justice sector actors in select area models,improve systematized legal aid service provision & dispute resolution mechanisms & strengthen justice sector institutional capacities.
